alexcrichton commented on issue #6886:

Ok I've worked on this a bit this morning and I've pushed up https://github.com/Nor2-io/wasmtime/pull/1 which contains another round of comments for me (and some fixes for the deny/vet-related things I think). As I mentioned over there I'm happy to go through anything if you'd like clarifications or explanations!

alexcrichton commented on issue #6886:

One more round of changes at https://github.com/Nor2-io/wasmtime/pull/2 (again happy to go through anything if you'd like), and then I think this is good to go :+1:

alexcrichton commented on issue #6886:

Also @silesmo would you be up for filing an issue for follow-up work?

silesmo commented on issue #6886:

Also @silesmo would you be up for filing an issue for follow-up work?

Yes I can do that! :smile:

alexcrichton commented on issue #6886:

Pat's busy with streams and such so he'll take a look at this after-the-fact, so I'm going to go ahead and flag this for merge. Thanks again @silesmo!

alexcrichton commented on issue #6886:

oh I think this may need a rebase for merging now?

silesmo commented on issue #6886:

oh I think this may need a rebase for merging now?

I merged the latest changes now
